TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendItem extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class LegendItem Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type LegendItem = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示一个图例项，它存储在 类中。

span.span: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个图例项，可以是默认项或自定义项：The class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - 默认图例项自动插入到数据序列或数据点的图例中。Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points. 饼图和圆环图的默认条目表示绘制的数据点，而所有其他图表类型的条目表示绘制的序列。Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series. 默认情况下，这些图例项对符号颜色使用数据点或序列颜色，并使用图例项文本的序列或数据点的名称。By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text. 可以在运行时使用控件的事件自定义或删除默认图例项 。Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the event of the control. - 自定义图例项具有用户定义的文本、符号颜色等。Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth. 与默认项不同，它们不与绘制的数据连接。Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data. 使用对象的属性可以在设计时或运行时添加自定义图例项 。Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the property of the object. 图例符号可以是矩形、线条或标记，具体取决于 对象的属性设置 。Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the property setting of a object. 自定义图例项的文本由 属性确定。The text of a custom legend item is determined by the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 请注意，你还可以使用 `Add` `Insert` 与对象的集合属性关联的和方法添加自定义图例项 。Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the collection property of the object.

span.span: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称、颜色和图像路径初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, color and image path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只 `image` `color` 需指定或参数。Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified. 如果同时指定两者，则 `image` 参数优先。If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定标题是否将显示渐变，并确定渐变的方向（如果使用）。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 仅当属性设置为时，才实现此属性 。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用 属性设置主色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用 属性设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用此 属性可设置所需的渐变样式。Use this property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定类型的画笔使用的阴影模式 。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影模式包含纯色背景色和在背景上绘制的线条。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用阴影样式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 阴影线的颜色由 属性确定。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是多个相关属性中的一个，用于确定多个对象的辅助背景色 ; 应用渐变颜色时使用此属性。The property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied. 仅当属性设置为时，才实现此属性 。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 可以设置 为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则 属性将确定图例项的阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item. 使用图例单元背景的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: 使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用 属性设置主色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用 属性设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用 属性可设置所需的渐变样式。Use the property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 如果对自定义图例项使用标记，则为。If you use a marker for a custom legend item. 此属性将设置标记的边框颜色。this property will set the border color of the marker. 但是，如果 还设置了属性，则其值优先。However, if the property is also set, its value has precedence. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性是一个用于获取或设置多个图表元素颜色的多个相关属性，它可以设置为任何 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。This property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果为数据点及其序列同时设置了此属性，数据点颜色将优先。If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence. 序列颜色将仅用于未定义自己的颜色的数据点。The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color. 如果自定义图例项使用标记，则此属性将确定标记颜色。If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color. 但是，如果 设置了属性，则其值将优先。However, if the property is set, its value then has precedence. 如果 属性指定了要用于图例项符号的图像，则将忽略此属性。This property will be ignored if the property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置将为图例项符号显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定要用于符号的图像文件 。This property determines the image file to be used for the symbol. 路径可以是绝对或相对 URL。The path can be an absolute or a relative URL. 如果设置了背景图像，则将显示该图像，而与 属性设置无关。If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the property setting. 设置 属性，以使图像使用的一种颜色显示为透明。Set the property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些样式确定如何显示项的相应符号。These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed. 样式可与 样式组合。A style can be combined with a style. 若要实现此目的，请先将 属性设置为 。To accomplish this, first set the property to . 然后，使用 属性指定标记图像，或使用属性 指定标记样式。Then use the property to specify a marker image, or the property to specify a marker style. 生成的符号将是线条和图像或标记的组合。The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的映射区特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例项的相应映射区的特性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of corresponding map area for the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，则会自动创建客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 还将创建一个映射区，并将其属性字符串追加到标记，该标记与要为 \ 其设置此属性的图表对象相对应。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the chart object for which this property is being set. 例如，使用此属性设置 Target 属性和 第一个数据点的属性将导致类似于以下代码的 HTML 代码：For example, setting the Target attribute using this property and the property of the first data point will result in HTML code that is similar to the following code: ```html ... ``` 由于将整个字符串追加到 \ 标记，因此应使用空格分隔多个属性。Because the entire string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 属性可与属性结合使用， 以指定映射区特性，例如 target = _blank，以及客户端事件处理程序，例如 OnClick = "MyEvent ( # A1"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 如果将属性设置为，则设置此属性将不起作用 `false` 。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。Its default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射，则 对象的属性 必须设置为 。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时，可以创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [图表图像呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). 设置此属性时，可以使用特殊关键字;每个关键字都将替换为适用的图表元素中的某些类型的数据。Special keywords may be used when setting this property; each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 有关所有可用关键字的列表，请参阅下表：Refer to the following table for a listing of all available keywords: |关键字Keyword|替换者Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|数据点的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL，#VALY，#VALY2，#VALY3 .。。#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|数据点的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|序列名称。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|数据点标签。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|数据点索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|数据点 Y 值的百分比。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|序列中所有 Y 值的总计。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|图例文本。Legend text.| 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射，请使用 根对象的属性 。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [图表图像呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于整个 。This property is applicable to the entire .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅在事件中使用 ，以确定默认图例项表示的数据系列。This property should only be used in the event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents. 该 属性应用于除饼图和球图之外的所有图表; 其默认图例项对应于绘图的数据点，而不是相对于绘图的序列。The property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series. 处理饼图和球图时，请改用 属性。When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the property instead. 开发人员不应设置此属性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于整个 。This property is applicable to the entire .

summary.span: 获取或设置与默认图例项关联的 对象的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of a object associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示默认图例关联的数据点在从零开始的索引中的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.

value.span: 除了饼图和圆环图之外的所有图表类型都将返回负一 (-1)。

span.span: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅在事件中使用 ，以确定 由默认饼图或球图图例条目表示的对象。This property should only be used in the event to determine the object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry. 饼图或球图以外的图表类型将返回一个 (-1) 的负一，因为默认图例项对应于绘图序列，而不是绘制数据点。Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points. 对于这些图表类型，请使用属性。Use the property for these chart types. 开发人员不应设置此属性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于整个 。This property is applicable to the entire .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置多个图表元素的阴影颜色，并且可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现 "真实" 阴影效果;尝试对阴影使用颜色 "128，0，0，0"。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，请将 属性设置为非零值 (0) 。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0). **注意** 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示相关图表元素的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下移动并向右移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致阴影向左移动和向左移动。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. **注意** 此属性仅适用于 具有 或的对象 。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例项的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，则会自动创建客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 还将创建一个映射区，并将其 `Title` 属性设置为指定的工具提示字符串。A map area will also be created with its `Title` attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 映射区将使用与标题对应的维度。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the title. 例如，如果为 数据点设置了属性，则在运行时将生成类似于以下内容的 HTML 代码：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: \\\ 如果将属性设置为，则设置此属性将不起作用 `false` 。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射，则 对象的属性 必须设置为 。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时，可以创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [图表图像呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). 此属性允许您设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [关键字](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射，请使用 根对象的属性 。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于整个 。This property is applicable to the entire .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的目标 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例项的目标 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL of a legend item.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则将该字符串视为一个相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，则将自动创建客户端图像映射。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 还将创建一个映射区，并将其 HREF 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL。A map area will also be created with its HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 此映射区域还将使用与相关图表元素对应的维度。This map area will also use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果为 数据点设置了属性，则在运行时将生成类似于以下内容的 HTML 代码：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: ```html ... ``` 如果将属性设置为，则设置此属性将不起作用 `false` 。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要以这种方式创建图像映射，则 对象的属性 必须设置为 。To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 使用二进制流式处理时，可以创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 可以通过使用属性来指定映射区 () 的属性，例如 TARGET = _Blank 。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, TARGET=_Blank, can be specified by using the property. 属性允许您设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的图表相关数据。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 有关详细信息，请参阅) (图表控件的关键字。For more information, see Keywords (Chart Controls). 若要创建具有用户定义坐标的图像映射，请使用 根对象的属性 。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [图表图像呈现](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505). > [!NOTE] > 此属性适用于整个 。This property is applicable to the entire .
